title: The Legend of Adam Caine
description: Summer 2006: 42 people are snatched from the London Underground in a blinding flash of light. They are unsure where they have been taken, or who has taken them. They are in mortal peril, but there is one among them who can break them free: Adam Caine, a reluctant war hero.After escaping, Caine is dragged again and again into conflict after conflict. As the violence escalates, can even a war hero make the right decision? Or will he damn himself forever, and lose everything he holds dear?
author: John Charles Scott
